name: Reset//Rest
description:
The world is ending and the human race have to work together to pick up the pieces of their old world in order to Grow a new one.

A Multiplayer Point and Click game, where the players traverse a grit structure in search of items which have to be brought back to the center. The grit however is shrinking and the players will have to work together to gather enough items, or be swallowed up by the wasteland.

Link for the Game:

http://www.drakkashi.com/files/createJam/
